WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closed by author request. Was fixed in one of the previous versions.
WorkItem.Description:
It seems to be impossible to remove (suppress) the author or year from the inline citations.
Please email me if you need more information at dipunm@gmail.com.
 
I saw that the disallowed variable was constructed using :
msxsl:node-set($data)/citation/noauthor
msxsl:node-set($data)/citation/notitle
msxsl:node-set($data)/citation/noyear
 
Those node sets were non existant so I created them based on the commented out text nodes underneath.
This made no difference so I reverted and will await your solution.

Comments.Message: sorry, Please close this, it seems this has been fixed in the later versions
